mapper.select: SELECT SEQ_NT, TITLE_NT, CONTENT_NT, DATE_NT FROM ( SELECT SEQ_NT, TITLE_NT, CONTENT_NT, DATE_NT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ_NT DESC) AS RNUM FROM NOTICE_TB ) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY SEQ_NT DESC
SELECT COUNT(SEQ_NT) FROM NOTICE_TB WHERE SEQ_NT > 0
